title_patterns: {number} Secrets {topic} Doesn't Want You to Know
The {topic} Hack That Will Change Your Life
hook_patterns: You won't believe what happens when...
I tried {topic} for {time_frame} and here's what happened
The #1 thing {authority} doesn't want you to know
I spent {amount} on {topic} and it was a huge mistake
I discovered a {topic} hack that will {achieve_something}
The one {topic} mistake that's costing you {loss}
engagement_baits: Can you guess what happens next in this {topic} story?
Share your worst {topic} experience in the comments
Do you think {statement} is true or false?
If you could {action}, what would you do?
What's the best {topic} advice you've ever received?
Can you relate to this {topic} struggle?
What's one thing you wish you knew about {topic} before?
scroll_stop_openers: I just discovered a shocking truth about {topic}
You're probably doing {topic} all wrong, here's why
The #1 thing you need to know about {topic} is
What if I told you there's a {topic} hack that
I spent years studying {topic} and here's what I found
If you're struggling with {topic}, you're not alone
The secret to {desirable_outcome} is hiding in plain sight
I'm about to share a {topic} secret that will change everything
retention_tricks: Use humor to break the ice
Make a bold claim or promise
Use visuals to illustrate a point
Ask a question and encourage discussion
cta_formulas: Unlock {exclusive_content} and take your {skill} to the next level
